alert.note: Alert for North Big Horn Basin; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 3:13AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong Wind Today and Freezing Temperatures tonight... This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton. * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to around 50 mph today. Temperatures falling below freezing tonight. * WHERE...Big Horn and Johnson Counties. * WHEN...Strong winds today; freezing temperatures tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind impacts mainly to transportation. There will likely be control issues for lightweight and high- profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. For freezing temperatures...any susceptible flowers are outside or tender vegetables have been planted in gardens, proactive measures should be taken tonight to prevent any harm.

area.areaDesc: North Big Horn Basin; Northeast Johnson County; Southeast Johnson County
